statements: SELECT * FROM CropYieldForecasting WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, weather_condition FROM CropYieldForecasting WHERE soil_nutrients = 'good';
SELECT id, sensor_id FROM CropYieldForecasting WHERE weather_condition = 'sunny';
SELECT * FROM CropYieldForecasting WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND weather_condition = 'rainy';
SELECT id, weather_condition, soil_nutrients FROM CropYieldForecasting WHERE id > 2;
SELECT * FROM CropYieldForecasting;
SELECT id, sensor_id, weather_condition FROM CropYieldForecasting WHERE weather_condition='Sunny';
SELECT id, sensor_id FROM CropYieldForecasting WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM CropYieldForecasting ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, weather_condition, soil_nutrients FROM CropYieldForecasting WHERE soil_nutrients IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT precipitation, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 60;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM weather_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM soil_nutrients WHERE nitrogen > 0.5 AND phosphorus < 0.2 ORDER BY nutrient_id ASC
SELECT sensor_id, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 60
SELECT nutrient_id, nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium FROM soil_nutrients WHERE potassium >= 0.3 ORDER BY phosphorus DESC, nutrient_id ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data INNER JOIN soil_nutrients ON weather_data.sensor_id = soil_nutrients.nutrient_id WHERE temperature > 30 AND nitrogen < 0.4 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM CropYieldData LIMIT 10;
SELECT crop_id, date FROM CropYieldData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM CropYieldData ORDER BY crop_id DESC;
SELECT crop_id, AVG(nitrogen) as avg_nitrogen FROM CropYieldData c INNER JOIN SoilNutrientsData s ON c.date = s.date GROUP BY crop_id;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND precipitation < 5;
SELECT crop_id, date, weather_conditions, soil_nutrients FROM CropYieldData WHERE crop_id = '7280c2d7-4792-4ff0-8a8f-d5860fa8be6d'
SELECT date, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND precipitation < 10
SELECT date, nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium FROM SoilNutrientsData WHERE nitrogen > 0.5 AND phosphorus < 1.0
SELECT crop_id, date FROM CropYieldData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT date, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM WeatherData ORDER BY precipitation DESC, temperature ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC
SELECT humidity, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2021-08-15'
SELECT * FROM soil_nutrients ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT sensor_type, location, reading_value FROM sensor_data WHERE reading_value < 50
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC
SELECT humidity, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 70 AND precipitation > 0.5
SELECT crop_name, year FROM crop_yield WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY crop_name
SELECT sensor_type, location, reading_value FROM sensor_data WHERE reading_value < 50 ORDER BY reading_value DESC
SELECT nutrient_id, date FROM soil_nutrients WHERE nitrogen > 0.3 AND phosphorus < 0.2 ORDER BY date
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT id, temperature, precipitation FROM weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, yield_prediction FROM crop_data WHERE yield_prediction > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_time, value FROM sensor_data WHERE value < 10 ORDER BY reading_time ASC;
SELECT crop_id, forecast_date, yield_forecast FROM yield_forecast WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY humidity DESC
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, yield_prediction FROM crop_data WHERE yield_prediction > 500 ORDER BY crop_name ASC
SELECT nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium FROM soil_nutrients WHERE nitrogen > 0.5 AND phosphorus < 0.2 AND potassium > 0.3 ORDER BY nitrogen DESC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'humidity_sensor' AND value > 50 ORDER BY reading_time DESC
SELECT crop_id, forecast_date, yield_forecast FROM yield_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY yield_forecast DESC
